entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then a few flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 26 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 this evening then diminishing to 20 overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
